survey_name: Home Gardening Trends and Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and trends in home gardening, including plant types, purchasing habits, and sustainability practices.

questions.question_text: How often do you engage in home gardening activities?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Recommended scale for frequency questions to gauge engagement levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice response.

script.question_text: How often do you engage in home gardening activities?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What types of plants do you typically grow in your home garden? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Rarely or never'.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture diverse gardening preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice response. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: What types of plants do you typically grow in your home garden? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears if Q1 is not 'Rarely or never'.
